name: Hands-Free Bags
description:
Cotton bags to wear on your hips or diagonally over one shoulder for a hands free movement and a sporty look. Their functionality impresses with its various compartments and comfort. They are beautiful, practical and just solve the discomfort of large bags and overfull pockets. It is also perfect to keep your valuable personal belongings. 

•Intended for girls and boys, men and women of all ages and sizes. 

•This is the perfect small hands-free bag for everyday use and also for short and long trips, excursions, the beach and in particular concerts, clubs and festivals!

•Attention: mini hidden pockets for the safety of your secret belongings!

•Great discounts on the purchase of more than 10/25/50 units of same model! 

•Check out our different models by asking us a question and get more pictures from our many styles!

Material: cotton fabrics with high quality YKK zippers. 

Colours: variety of colours (uni-colored and with patterns). 

Dimensions: 18x25cm with zipper Adjustable length 80cm 

Uses: 
- Sports: urban cycling, mountain bike, skateboarding, climbing, skiing, snowboarding… 
- Hobbies: beach, hiking, urban trips, clubbing, concerts and festivals. 
- Business: daily use and ideal for travelling. 

Shipping: shipping worldwide at a very advantageous cost (subject to conditions bpost - Belgium) 

Design & Production: Barcelona (Spain) with representation in Brussels (Belgium). 

Contact: davidcrous80@hotmail.com +32 (0) 476 87 99 29
